https://qmenu.us/#/ happy-wok-ann-arbor/menu/1525253221851 15/15

Address: 1916 W Stadium Blvd, Ann Arbor, MI 48103
Description: Counter-serve Chinese eatery offers traditional noodles & some Pan-Asian fare in simple digs.

summary.snippet: "Overall happy with location, convenient parking, tasty food & good service."
"I ordered shrimp tempura roll and the shrimp was sitting on top of the rolls."
"Best takeout Chinese dishes in the area."

most_relevant.description:
Happy Wok keeps me happy.
Everything is price comparative to anything around town.
Service and food are always on point.
I would like to see some egg in that "fried rice" :)
Very delicious food definitely recommend it I’ve ordered a beef with broccoli 10/10  come get yours you will not regret it :)

This is easily the best Chinese food takeout in the area. It’s consistently on-time, delicious, with huge portions at an affordable price. I haven’t found something I don’t like at Happy Wok! I love going here, it’s our favorite takeout place. We always get the General Tso Chicken, the sweet and sour chicken, and the crab rangoons. I highly recommend!

I’ve ordered off their lunch menu several times now and the food was always great. I’ve tried the sweet and sour chicken, almond chicken, and shrimp lo mein and it was all really good. The prices are very reasonable and you get plenty of food to fill up for lunch. I’m going to keep trying more stuff on the menu but I’m sure it’ll be just as good. I highly recommend this place if you want a very good and quick take out meal of Chinese food. This is one of the better places in the Ann Arbor area.

We looked for years for the perfect Chinese food carry out spot, then finally discovered Happy Wok. What took us so long? They feature personable, prompt service, delicious entrees and soups, and they are very accurate in adjusting to special orders. The prices are on point and it's just the easiest meal of the week for us. Happy Wok makes us happy!

Decided not to order from China Tonight in Chelsea Michigan even though I work at Chelsea Milling Company aka Jiffy Baking Mixes. I stay in Ann Arbor while in Michigan. First time Happy Wok customer from Maine living in Ann Arbor for business for a few months and I absolutely love Chinese food, chinese people, their culture and their amazing food and cooking skills. I ordered Chicken Egg Roll = B, Fried Pork Pot Stickers = C, General Tso Chicken Wings = A++ but the $17.95 Seafood Fries Rice = F. Worst Fried rice I’ve ever had. The base fried rice itself was poor and had no taste then they throw in very smelly tiny scallops, the worst smelling half lobster tail ever like smelly seafood, about (6) 26-30 ct shrimp and then a ton of Surimi aka fake or imitation crab meat and the quality was disgusting like soft tissue and smelled and tasted like nothing. My picture shows about a pound of surimi, imitation crab meat but the overall quality was gross and smelled terrible. We literally gagged when we tried eating the seafood fried rice and I had to take out all of the surimi imitation crab because it was making me so sick. So disappointed as I love seafood but this rice was disgusting. I feel terrible even saying it because I don’t want the restaurant seems legit and the man at front counter is super nice and probably family of owners or is the owner but they show the seafood fried rice and seafood lo mein in the Google gallery but believe me it smells and tastes terrible. Just my opinion but I’ve eaten Chinese food all over the country and this dish just doesn’t cut it. Sorry Happy Wok but the Seafood Fried Rice just doesn’t cut it.

Wow, actually shocked about how amazing the quality of the food was!!. Shrimp and broccoli was so good ordered a second order to go. Shrimps were huge and perfectly cooked, broccoli was perfectly cooked & the brown sauce was yummy! The place was super clean and organized!!! Totally worth it!!A+
Order Black pepper chicken, it's soo goood. Im sure their menu r good. Foods r fresh n delicious.  Recommend to come back n order again. Your stomach will be happy and party in ur mouth lol
